Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your needs exceptionally well. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it would bring to you, I propose a price of $950000 for this remarkable item. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's value to you and my commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true worth. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
